q: " Today Mr Justice Holman, sitting in London, allowed the challenges by the councils, declaring Mr Michael Gove had unlawfully failed to consult them before imposing the cuts." In five of the cases the failure was so unfair as to amount to an abuse of power, said the judge. The point is that the Tories are doing this acting; unlawfully, abusing power, not Labour who are currently in opposition, at least theorectically, which is my point! Remember,

Rumsfeld said Khurmal was operated by Ansar al-Islam, a Sunni militant group with ties to Abu Musab al-Zarqawi , a Jordanian extremist who later led the Iraq branch of the al-Qaida terrorist network.
